agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that offers support groups and bereavement materials for parents, siblings, and other family members who have experienced the death of a child.
service_name: DEATH OF A CHILD SUPPORT GROUP
service_description: Offers support groups and bereavement materials for parents, siblings, and other family members who have experienced the death of a child.
site_details: Call the national office or visit website for local meeting information.
site_schedule: Support Groups: Days and hours vary by location -- National Office: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm
site_eligibility: Family members who have experienced the death of a child
